meanings.definition: A point of maximum displacement in a wave
meanings.sent1: The antinode of the wave showed where the highest point was.
meanings.sent2: In the ocean, you can see an antinode where the wave reaches its peak.
meanings.sent3: The antinode in the music made everyone jump up and down.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like an antinode, reaching every corner.
meanings.sent5: The bright red flag acted as an antinode, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A point of minimum amplitude in a standing wave
meanings.sent1: The antinode of the standing wave was barely noticeable.
meanings.sent2: When playing the guitar, you can feel the antinode where the sound is weakest.
meanings.sent3: The antinode in the room made it hard to hear the music clearly.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like an antinode in the serious atmosphere of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The shadow cast by the tree acted as an antinode, creating a cool spot to rest.
